st leave a stitch marker in this row 31 8 st 32 8 st 33 8 st 34 8 st 35 8 st 36 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in first 3 st decrease 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 7 st 37 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in each stitch of previous row 5 st 50 5 st 51 5 st 52 5 st 53 5 st 54 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in first 1 st decrease 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 4 st 55 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in each stitch of previous row 4 st 56 4 st 57 4 st 58 4 st 59 4 st 60 4 st leaves make however many you want i used three start with a magic_ring using bulky accent yarn 1 chain 3 12 double_crochet in magic_ring slip_stitch to join 2 chain 1 single_crochet in first st 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st double_crochet then tc in next st pst tc then double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st slip_stitch to join and tie off putting it together 1 single_crochet one side of the bottom of the bag to the round edge of the half circle matching up stitches on the half circle with row on the bottom 60 st 2 pin the other side of the bottom of the bag to the edge of the full circle a pin one end row of the bottom to a st on the circle count 30 sts around the circle and pin this st to the middle of the bottom where you ve placed a stitch marker already and then count another 30 sts and pin the other end row of the bottom here b count 9
